meanings.sent1: The story was so logicless that it didn't make any sense.
meanings.sent2: Her argument was dismissed as logicless by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The logicless plan to build a house without any materials was doomed to fail.
meanings.sent4: Trying to navigate the maze without a map felt like a logicless endeavor.
meanings.sent5: The logicless decision to wear a winter coat in the summer heat left everyone puzzled.

meanings.sent1: The jumbled mess of wires looked completely logicless to the inexperienced electrician.
meanings.sent2: The professor found the student's argument to be completely logicless.
meanings.sent3: The logicless dance routine had the audience laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a logicless maze, with thoughts going in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The logicless puzzle had pieces that didn't fit together no matter how hard you tried.
